text: Hanki ko'ma havizama hu'nea ranra kumatamina tamagra ete eri so'e huta negita, tamagehe'zama korapa'ma noma ki'naza marufi eri zugage huta nona kigahaze. Ana nehanage'za vahe'mo'za tamagrikura hu'za, havizama hu'nea keginane, nontamine, kumapi ne'onse kantamina eri zugage hu'za ki vahere hu'za hugahaze.
